about_the_game:
Street Artist Simulator is an open world action game where you’re a writer. Find spots, draw graffiti and become a legend. Just remember, don’t get busted.

In this game, you will play as a street artist whose only dream is to become a street legend. You will create your own graffiti to decorate the city with it. Unfortunately, not everyone will like your action, you will also have to do it when nobody is seeing. When someone sees you, you better run away. You can fight, but your chances are slim against everyone else. In addition, you must also eat and sleep, if you cannot afford food, you can always rummage in the trash, but this is not the best diet. You can always take a job for cash, or use your hacking skills and wipe someone's account. You just have to remember that your choices will always have consequences.

Draw


In Street Artist Simulator you can design your own graffiti from stencils and then place it in the game world.

Don’t get caught


Become a writter where spray is your weapon, choose escape in close combat. Befriend the city, use parkour to escape law enforcement officers more efficiently.

Find spots


There's a bunch of places waiting for you in Clean City, only your imagination will determine how to get there.

Be famous


Become a street art legend.Draw in a spot where the most people can admire your graffiti.

Hack


Hack environment to gain an advantage over an enemy. The entire city infrastructure at the touch of a finger!

Features

  • Unique graffiti painting mechanic
  • An open world filled with people who will react to your behavior
  • Parkour, move around buildings to get to your destination faster
  • Get food, money, shelter to survive in the city
  • Sneak up to avoid getting caught
  • Use the phone to hack the environment

name: Street Artist Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon r9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Become a street artist, let art set you free! Street Artist Simulator is an open-world action game where you’re a writer. Find spots, draw graffiti and become a legend. Just remember, don’t get busted.
